overlaps(int, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime) - Static method in class helper.database.AppointmentDB
Determines if given start and end dates/times overlap with existing appointments by customer.
overlaps(int, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int) - Static method in class helper.database.AppointmentDB
Determines if given start and end dates/times overlap with existing appointments by customer, excluding appointment with given ID.
